hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said; "A man came to the Prophet and said:'What should we wear when we enter Ihram?' He said: 'Do not wear a shirt, or an 'Imamah, or pants, or a burnouts, or Khuffs unless you cannot find any sandals. If you cannot find any sandals, then wear something that comes beneath the ankles

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ لُبْسِ الْعِمَامَةِ، فِي الإِحْرَامِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition of Wearing an 'Imamah in Ihram
